mapper.select: SELECT mb_num AS mbNum, mb_email AS mbEmail, mb_name AS mbName, mb_tel AS mbTel, mb_birth AS mbBirth , mb_nickname AS mbNickname, mb_grade AS mbGrade, mb_point AS mbPoint FROM member WHERE mb_num = #{mbNum}
SELECT mv_title AS mvTitle, mv_director AS mvDirector, mv_actor AS mvActor, mv_time AS mvTime, mv_agelimit AS mvAgelimit FROM MOVIE WHERE mv_num = #{mvNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon SET c_kind = 0 WHERE c_num = #{cNum}
mapper.select: SELECT c_num AS "cNum", c_name AS "cName", c_ratio AS "cRatio" FROM coupon WHERE mb_num = #{mbNum} AND c_kind IS NOT NULL
SELECT c_num AS cNum, mb_num AS mbNum, c_name AS cName, c_target AS cTarget, c_ratio AS cRatio, c_kind AS cKind FROM coupon WHERE c_num = #{cNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket ( t_num, mb_num, t_price, t_means, t_time, t_status, mv_num ) VALUES ( #{tNum}, 1, #{tPrice}, #{tMeans}, SYSDATE, #{tStatus} , #{mvNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT MV_NUM AS mvNum, MV_TITLE AS mvTitle FROM MOVIE WHERE MV_ON = 1

SELECT T1.MV_NUM AS mvNum, TO_CHAR(T2.MI_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS miTime, T2.MI_QUALITY AS miQuality FROM MOVIE T1, MOVIE_INFO T2 WHERE T1.MV_NUM = T2.MV_NUM AND T1.MV_NUM = #{mvNum} AND T2.MI_QUALITY LIKE '%' || #{miQuality} || '%' ORDER BY T2.MI_TIME
